description_txt: stated on March 28, 2012 in remarks to the press:
quote_txt: "It's the first time in the nation this many members have been drawn (by a Legislature) into the same districts where it wasn't a court order."

description_txt: stated on April 10, 2012 in a Web ad:
quote_txt: Says oil "production's down where Obama's in charge."

description_txt: stated on April 12, 2012 in a television ad:
quote_txt: Says Sen. Bill Nelson voted to spend "$144,541 to see how monkeys react under the influence of cocaine."

description_txt: stated on April 11, 2012 in a TV interview.:
quote_txt: Says a bill requiring ultrasounds before abortions "was supported by Republicans and Democrats."

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2012 in a television ad:
quote_txt: "Together we added more jobs than any other area" while I was Dane County executive.

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2012:
quote_txt: "[O]ver 200,000 ordinary citizens were given the opportunity to identify projects they preferred."

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2012 in a campaign email:
quote_txt: "Since President Obama took office, our federal spending has increased by nearly 30 percent and our national debt has increased by almost 50 percent."

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2012 in a graphic posted on his website:
quote_txt: "What president has the worst record on female labor force participation? Barack Obama."

description_txt: stated on April 3, 2012 in campaign website:
quote_txt: Says the treasurer’s office has "saved $37 million in management costs for the oversight of public investments."

description_txt: stated on April 4, 2012 in a public appearance.:
quote_txt: The 2011 Legislature did not cut Texas public school funding.

description_txt: stated on March 29, 2012 in a television ad:
quote_txt: Says "unemployment tripled" in Dane County due to Kathleen Falk’s tax policies

description_txt: stated on April 4, 2012 in a news conference:
quote_txt: Says New Jersey Devils managing partner Jeff Vanderbeek "took us into arbitration."

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2012 in an interview on MSNBC’s Morning Joe:
quote_txt: Says New Jersey Devils managing partner Jeff Vanderbeek "froze all those monies during the toughest years in ‘08-’09" and "refused to give the charitable dollars that he was required to give by the contract."

description_txt: stated on March 29, 2012 in a debate on the state House floor.:
quote_txt: Says abortion doctors are "flying into this state, performing abortions and flying out."

description_txt: stated on April 4, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: Sen. Sherrod Brown’s vote helped pass "Barack Obama’s job-killing health care law, which slapped small businesses throughout Ohio with a $500 billion tax increase."

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2012 in a robocall:
quote_txt: President Obama's refusal to grant permits for offshore drilling is one reason gasoline prices are soaring.
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • April 12, 2012

description_txt: stated on April 10, 2012 in a town hall meeting in Jensen Beach, Fla.:
quote_txt: About 78 to 81 House Democrats "are members of the Communist Party. ... It’s called the Congressional Progressive Caucus."

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2012 in a web video.:
quote_txt: Says she balanced a $10 billion budget shortfall without raising taxes.

description_txt: stated on April 29, 2012 in a television ad:
quote_txt: Mayor Tom Barrett’s policies drove unemployment up 27 percent in Milwaukee, pushing it to "one of America’s 10 worst cities for unemployment."

description_txt: stated on March 28, 2012 in a video posted on YouTube:
quote_txt: Says the United States "actually exports more gasoline, diesel and other fuels than it imported in 2011 for the first time since, I think, 1949."

description_txt: stated on February 23, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: The Keystone oil pipeline "would employ 20,000 people in the United States."

description_txt: stated on March 27, 2012 in a conference call:
quote_txt: Says that Mitt Romney, while he was in Arizona, said he believes the state’s SB 1070 immigration law should be the model for national immigration laws.

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2012 in an interview with Fox News:
quote_txt: "Our rainy day fund has gone from 89 cents to $240 million."

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2012 in Mitt Romney's website:
quote_txt: "Women account for 92.3 percent of the jobs lost under Obama."

description_txt: stated on April 10, 2012 in a speech at Florida Atlantic University in Boca Raton, Fla. :
quote_txt: "98 percent of American families" make "under $250,000 a year."

description_txt: stated on April 10, 2012 in a congressional Web page:
quote_txt: President Barack Obama "has doubled the size of government since he took office."

description_txt: stated on March 10, 2012 in a candidates' forum.:
quote_txt: Says "at the state level we're spending more on tax expenditures than we are on public safety, health care and education combined."

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2012 in an email:
quote_txt: "Why was there no news coverage of this raid on the Arizona border? … Seizure was just five days ago. Right on the Arizona border!"

description_txt: stated on April 4, 2012 in an online video:
quote_txt: "6.4 million more Americans living in poverty under President Obama."

description_txt: stated on March 24, 2012 in a speech:
quote_txt: Says Wisconsin women facing pay discrimination can't "do something about it" under bill passed by Republicans.
